title: Banoffee pavlova
ingredients: ['200g caster sugar', '2 teaspoons cornflour', 'pinch of cream of tartar', '4 egg whites (at room temperature)', 'pinch of salt', 'dash of vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon white wine vinegar', '1 or 2 bananas', '230ml caramel sauce', '120ml double cream, whipped', 'grated chocolate to decorate']
